chapters.title: Chapter 20:  A Choice
chapters.info: Mistress al'Donel, p. 305—Woman from Emond's Field. She once demanded that Bran al'Vere fix the problem that no storks were nesting on the rooftops in the spring. He honestly did not know what she would have had him do. She appears in Nynaeve's test for the shawl, though she is fending off Shadowspawn during that test.
